description_for_human: Control battle music with Spotify and generate AI voices with ElevenLabs (including emotions) for Project X.
description_for_model: Use this to play context-based battle music from Spotify or generate character voices with emotions via ElevenLabs. Choose music automatically based on battle context (boss, enemy, ambient, etc.) or play a specific track by URI. Generate voices by passing character name, text, and optional emotion (e.g., 'angry', 'calm').
